sentences.en: A canoe is a ticklish craft.
Cut it out! You know I'm ticklish.
sentences.cn: 住手! 你知道我怕痒.

sentences.en: Handling awkward neighbours can be a ticklish business .
sentences.cn: 和难处的邻居打交道有时是件十分棘手的事情。

sentences.en: He seemed to be at his wits end before those ticklish questions.
sentences.cn: 面对那些棘手的问题他也显得束手无策了.

sentences.en: I let them fire away. I taught them to ask still more ticklish questions.
sentences.cn: 我让他们不停地问, 我教他们提出更难以启齿的问题.

sentences.en: I seemed to at my wits end before those ticklish questions.
sentences.cn: 面对那些棘手的问题我显得束手无策.

sentences.en: On retrospect, the fear of each calculated move from her side expounded the ticklish sensation.
sentences.cn: 回首过去, 她每个计算过的举动都引起有著搔痒感觉的恐惧.

sentences.en: One is plant ticklish is cosmopolitan pest cole moth, chemically insecticide kills more more.
sentences.cn: 有一种很难对付的世界性害虫小菜蛾, 用化学杀虫剂越杀越多.

sentences.en: So car makers are faced with the ticklish problem of how to project products at new buyers.
sentences.cn: 因此，汽车制造商面临着怎样向新顾客树立产品形象的大难题。

sentences.en: So, I touched its trunk and branches, it turned out swinging around, and seems to ticklish.
sentences.cn: 于是, 我摸了摸它的枝干, 它果然左右摇摆了, 好像很怕痒.

sentences.en: The bottoms of feet are ticklish.
The news is quite ticklish to the ear.
sentences.cn: 这消息听起来使人觉得有些难办.

sentences.en: This massage method is not recommended for anyone who is very ticklish.
sentences.cn: 这种按摩法不推荐给怕痒的人使用。

sentences.en: We only feel ticklish if we detect a sense of invasion or attack.
sentences.cn: 我们只会在察觉受到侵犯或攻击时才会觉得痒.

words.tran_cn: 胳肢；痒感；使人发痒、高兴的东西
难题；使人痒的东西或人；备忘录；使人高兴的人或物
不安定的，不稳定的；难对付的；易倒的；易痒的；忌讳的

trans.tran_cn: （指人）怕痒的，需要小心处理的，难对付的，棘手的
trans.tran_en: someone who is ticklish laughs a lot when you tickle them
